item.title: Some tips when build blog with hugo
item.description: Translate By ChatGPT. After several attempts and giving up, I finally decided to pick up my personal blog again. On the one hand, I hope to share some of my thoughts on work and life with everyone, and on the other hand, I also want to exercise my writing ability. item.title: About me
item.description: Introduction This is an engineer’s blog, mainly recording some trivial matters of life and technical thinking. Main technical scope: stability construction, Linux, computer network, Java & Python, software engineering. I like playing badminton and occasionally running. If you are in Hangzhou, we can make an appointment. Friend Links
